Page.ScreenName: Fixed Assets History End Of Period Listing
Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter (C)lass, (S)ummary or (D)etail DropDown PPDField01 1 3 R Enter a valid option. H C,S,D CLASS,SUMMARY,DETAIL
Enter Class No. or (ALL) Text PPDField02 1 8 R
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
Enter Level: 0-Acct,1-Div,2-Dept,3-Cctr DropDown PPDField04 3 3 R Level 0-Account, 1-Division, 2-Department, 3-Cost Center H 0,1,2,3 0,1,2,3
Enter Period (YYYYPP) Text PPDField05 3 6 R Enter a valid period (ex. 200201)
